message.name: ERR_PROVIDEROFFERINGPLACELIMIT_XRV_PLACE_LIMIT_START_DATE_MUST_BE_ON_OR_AFTER_SERVICE_START_DATE
message.locale: The provider service place limit Start Date, %1d, must be on or after the provider service Start Date, %2d.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDEROFFERINGPLACELIMIT_FV_PLACE_LIMIT_MUST_BE_GREATER
message.locale: The Place Limit, %1n, must be greater than %2n.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDEROFFERINGPLACELIMIT_XRV_PROVIDER_OFFERING_DUPLICATE_ENTRY
message.locale: The provider offering Place Limit, %1d, already exists for this provider offering.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDEROFFERINGPLACELIMIT_XRV_CANNOT_CREATE_PLACELIMIT_ALREADY_EXISTS_WITH_STARTDATE
message.locale: The provider service Place Limit already exists from %1d.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDEROFFERINGPLACELIMIT_XRV_CANNOT_CREATE_PLACELIMIT_ALREADY_EXISTS_WITH_STARTDATE_AND_ENDDATE
message.locale: The provider service Place Limit already exists from %1d to %2d.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDEROFFERINGPLACELIMIT_FV_MODIFY_PROVIDER_OFFERING_ID
message.locale: The Provider Offering for this Place Limit cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDEROFFERINGPLACELIMIT_XRV_PLACE_LIMIT_END_DATE_MUST_BE_ON_OR_AFTER_CURRENT_DATE
message.locale: The provider service Place Limit End Date, %1d, must be on or after the current date, %2d.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDEROFFERINGPLACELIMIT_XRV_PLACE_LIMIT_START_DATE_MUST_BE_ON_OR_AFTER_CONTRACT_STARTDATE
message.locale: The Place Limit start date, %1d, must be on or after the contract start date, %2d.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDEROFFERINGPLACELIMIT_XRV_PLACE_LIMIT_END_DATE_MUST_BE_ON_OR_BEFORE_CONTRACT_ENDDATE
message.locale: The Place Limit end date, %1d, must be on or before the contract end date, %2d.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDEROFFERINGPLACELIMIT_XRV_PLACE_LIMIT_CANNOT_BE_ADDED
message.locale: The Unit of Measure for this provider service is not "Place", place limit cannot be created.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDEROFFERINGPLACELIMIT_XRV_PLACE_LIMIT_CANNOT_BE_MODIFIED
message.locale: This Place Limit is included in a contract, it cannot be modified here.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDEROFFERINGPLACELIMIT_XRV_PLACE_LIMIT_CANNOT_BE_DELETED
message.locale: This Place Limit, %1n, is included in a contract, it cannot be deleted here.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDEROFFERINGPLACELIMIT_XRV_PLACE_LIMIT_CANNOT_BE_INSERTED
message.locale: The contract is 'Live', Place Limit cannot be added.
